statements: SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interaction_type, item_id FROM user_interactions WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM user_interactions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_id, MAX(rating) FROM user_interactions GROUP BY item_id;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, item_id, rating FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' AND rating > 4;
SELECT user_id, item_id FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('view', 'click') AND item_id = '0987a6f5-1fc5-4ee5-a6b9-48c3b1f19d24';
SELECT AVG(rating) AS average_rating, interaction_type FROM user_interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY average_rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, item_id, feedback FROM user_interactions WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL AND LENGTH(feedback) > 20 AND SUBSTRING(item_id FROM 1 FOR 5) = '0987a';
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 123
SELECT preference_id, user_id, preference_category FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_category = 'Color'
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT interaction_id, user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM UserInteractions WHERE interaction_type = 'like'
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS interaction_count FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY interaction_type HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 123 AND interaction_type = 'like' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT u.user_id, p.preference_category, p.preference_value FROM UserInteractions u INNER JOIN UserPreferences p ON u.user_id = p.user_id WHERE u.interaction_type = 'comment';
SELECT * FROM user_interactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type FROM user_interactions WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT preference_type, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM recommendations ORDER BY recommendation_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM recommendations WHERE recommendation_text LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY recommendation_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_interactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS interactions_count FROM user_interactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING interactions_count > 5;
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM user_preferences WHERE preference_type = 'genre' ORDER BY preference_value ASC;
SELECT user_id, interaction_type, DATE(timestamp) AS date_of_interaction FROM user_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'like';
SELECT r.recommendation_text, u.user_id, u.user_id, u.preference_type FROM recommendations r JOIN user_preferences u ON r.user_id = u.user_id;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions
SELECT user_id, preference_type, preference_value FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY preference_type DESC
SELECT user_id, recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_id BETWEEN 10 AND 20
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY user_id ASC
SELECT user_id, activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivity WHERE activity_type = 'login'
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, preference_type FROM UserPreferences WHERE preference_value = 'high' LIMIT 10;
SELECT recommendation_text FROM Recommendations WHERE recommendation_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY recommendation_id;
SELECT interaction_type, timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 3 AND interaction_type LIKE '%click%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT activity_type, activity_timestamp FROM UserActivity WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY activity_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions;
SELECT user_id, interaction_time, interaction_type FROM UserInteractions WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, preference_name, preference_value FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT recommended_item_id, recommendation_score FROM RecommendationHistory WHERE recommendation_score > 0.8;
SELECT item_name, category FROM ItemDetails WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, preference_name, last_updated FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT recommended_item_id, recommendation_date, recommendation_score FROM RecommendationHistory WHERE user_id = 2002 AND recommendation_score > 0.5 ORDER BY recommendation_date DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_description, category FROM ItemDetails WHERE category = 'Electronics' OR category = 'Clothing' ORDER BY item_name ASC;

SELECT user_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM UserInteractions JOIN UserPreferences ON UserInteractions.user_id = UserPreferences.user_id WHERE UserPreferences.preference_name = 'theme_color';
